summary: This document is an email from Beth Adele Perroaabs regarding a new client, Steve Marshall, who is seeking representation for a property purchase at 338 Washington Rd in Bradford. The email mentions that Sotheby's recommended their firm for this transaction.

persons.name: Beth Adele Perroaabs
persons.context: Beth Adele Perroaabs is the sender of the email, discussing the representation of a new client.

persons.name: Steve Marshall
persons.context: Steve Marshall is the new client seeking legal representation for a property purchase.

connections.description: Beth Adele Perroaabs is set to represent Steve Marshall in his property purchase.

keyFacts: Steve Marshall is seeking legal representation for a property purchase.
The property in question is located at 338 Washington Rd in Bradford.
Sotheby's recommended the law firm to Steve Marshall.
The email contains a fraud alert regarding wire transfers.
Beth Adele Perroaabs is the attorney handling the case.
